name: State of Emergency (itch)
description:
• Press "P" to restart when you're in the city

This game was made in a week for the 7th GoedWare Jam. I hope you like it!

Sorry about the huge file size, 1.4gb was the best I could compress it. It is optimized for lower spec computers though! I also couldn't figure out how to get the items to save between scenes so you just pick them up again in the building :)

**CREDITS**

Luke Smith - Designer and dude who did everything
Caleb Harris - Voice actor for Paul
Daniel Thornton - Voice actor for gangsters
Abbie Daigle - Voice actor for Maddy (the little girl)
